languages.text: "Я родом не из {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простора{/g}. Я была отправлена сюда, чтобы стать стражем реликвария Футфола. Но корабль попал в варп-аномалию — хотя для нас на борту прошли дни, в {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}реальном мире{/g} миновали десятилетия".

traits.locale_text: "Я родом не из {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Коронуса{/g}. Я была отправлена сюда, чтобы стать стражем реликвария Футфола. Но корабль попал в варп-аномалию — хотя для нас на борту прошли дни, в реальном мире миновали десятилетия".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "I wasn't born in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g}. I was sent here to be a guardian of a reliquary on Footfall. But my ship became caught in a warp anomaly, and although it lasted only days for those on board, decades had flown by in {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g}."
languages.original_text: "Я родом не из {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простора{/g}. Я была отправлена сюда, чтобы стать стражем реликвария Футфола. Но корабль попал в варп-аномалию — хотя для нас на борту прошли дни, в {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}реальном мире{/g} миновали десятилетия".

traits.locale_text: "I wasn't born in Koronus. I was sent here to become a guardian of a reliquary on Footfall. But the ship got caught in a warp anomaly — even though days had passed for those onboard, decades had flown by in the real world."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I wasn't born in Koronus. I was sent here to become a guardian of a reliquary on Footfall. But the ship got caught in a warp anomaly — even though days had passed for those onboard, decades had flown by in the real world."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I wasn't born in the Koronus. I was sent here to be a guardian of a reliquary on Footfall. But my ship became caught in a warp anomaly, and although it lasted only days for those onboard, decades had flown by in realspace."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I wasn't born in the Koronus. I was sent here to be a guardian of a reliquary on Footfall. But my ship became caught in a warp anomaly, and although it lasted only days for those onboard, decades had flown by in realspace."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I wasn't born in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus{/g}. I was sent here to be a guardian of a reliquary on Footfall. But my ship became caught in a warp anomaly, and although it lasted only days for those onboard, decades had flown by in realspace."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I wasn't born in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g}. I was sent here to be a guardian of a reliquary on Footfall. But my ship became caught in a warp anomaly, and although it lasted only days for those on board, decades had flown by in {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g}."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “我并不是在{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}出生的。当时，我被派到落脚港，担任圣骨匣的守护者，但我的飞船却被卷入了亚空间风暴之中。尽管对船上的人来说仅仅过了几天，但在{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}真实世界{/g}中，我们却航行了几十年。”
languages.original_text: "I wasn't born in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g}. I was sent here to be a guardian of a reliquary on Footfall. But my ship became caught in a warp anomaly, and although it lasted only days for those on board, decades had flown by in {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g}."

traits.locale_text: “我并不是在{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯星域{/g}出生的。当时，我被派到落脚港，担任圣骨匣的守护者，但我的飞船却被卷入了亚空间风暴之中。尽管对船上的人来说仅仅过了几天，但在现实世界中，我们却航行了几十年。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «No nací en la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión{/g}. Me enviaron aquí para que protegiera una reliquia en Paso. Pero una anomalía en la disformidad atrapó mi nave y, aunque para los que estábamos a bordo solo pasaron unos días, en el {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}espacio real{/g} pasaron décadas».
languages.original_text: "I wasn't born in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g}. I was sent here to be a guardian of a reliquary on Footfall. But my ship became caught in a warp anomaly, and although it lasted only days for those on board, decades had flown by in {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g}."

traits.locale_text: «No nací en la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión{/g}. Me enviaron aquí para que protegiera una reliquia en Paso. Pero una anomalía en la disformidad atrapó mi nave y, aunque para los que estábamos a bordo solo pasaron unos días, en el espacio real pasaron décadas».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「我は{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}エクスパンス{/g}で生まれたわけではありません。フットフォールの聖遺物のガーディアンとしてここに送られました。しかし、我の船は歪みの異常現象に巻き込まれた。あれはクルーにとっては数日のことでしたが、{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}リアルスペース{/g}では数十年が過ぎ去っていたのです」
languages.original_text: "I wasn't born in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g}. I was sent here to be a guardian of a reliquary on Footfall. But my ship became caught in a warp anomaly, and although it lasted only days for those on board, decades had flown by in {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g}."

traits.locale_text: 「我は{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}エクスパンス{/g}で生まれたわけではありません。フットフォールの聖遺物のガーディアンとしてここに送られました。しかし、我の船は歪みの異常現象に巻き込まれた。あれはクルーにとっては数日のことでしたが、{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}リアルスペース{/g}では数十年が過ぎ去っていたのです」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich wurde nicht in der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Ausdehnung{/g} geboren. Ich wurde hergeschickt, um als Wächterin einer Reliquie auf Footfall zu dienen. Aber mein Schiff geriet in eine Warp-Anomalie, und obwohl sie für alle an Bord nur Tage dauerte, vergingen im {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}Realraum{/g} Jahrzehnte."
languages.original_text: "I wasn't born in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g}. I was sent here to be a guardian of a reliquary on Footfall. But my ship became caught in a warp anomaly, and although it lasted only days for those on board, decades had flown by in {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g}."

traits.locale_text: "Ich wurde nicht in der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Ausdehnung{/g} geboren. Ich wurde hergeschickt, um als Wächterin einer Reliquie auf Footfall zu dienen. Aber mein Schiff geriet in eine Warp-Anomalie, und obwohl sie für alle an Bord nur Tage dauerte, vergingen im Realraum Jahrzehnte."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Je ne suis pas née dans les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}. On m'a envoyée à Castel en mission pour garder un reliquaire. Cependant, mon vaisseau s'est retrouvé pris dans une anomalie du Warp, et bien que cet incident n'ait duré que quelques jours pour ceux qui se trouvaient à bord, des dizaines d'années se sont écoulées dans l'{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}espace réel{/g}. »
languages.original_text: "I wasn't born in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g}. I was sent here to be a guardian of a reliquary on Footfall. But my ship became caught in a warp anomaly, and although it lasted only days for those on board, decades had flown by in {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g}."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne suis pas née dans les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}. On m'a envoyée à Castel en mission pour garder un reliquaire. Cependant, mon vaisseau s'est retrouvé pris dans une anomalie du Warp, et bien que cet incident n'ait duré que quelques jours pour ceux qui se trouvaient à bord, des dizaines d'années se sont écoulées dans l'espace réel. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ben {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Enginlik'te{/g} doğmadım. Buraya, Binliman'daki bir kutsal emanet odasının muhafızı olmak üzere gönderildim. Ancak gemim bir öteboyut anomalisine kapıldı. Birkaç günde atlattık atlatmasına da meğerse o esnada {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}gerçekuzayda{/g} onlarca yıl geçmiş."
languages.original_text: "I wasn't born in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g}. I was sent here to be a guardian of a reliquary on Footfall. But my ship became caught in a warp anomaly, and although it lasted only days for those on board, decades had flown by in {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g}."

traits.locale_text: "Ben {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Enginlik{/g}'te doğmadım. Buraya, Binliman'da bir emanetin koruyucusu olmak üzere gönderildim… Ancak gemim, bir öteboyut anomalisine kurban gitti. Gemidekiler için yalnızca birkaç gün geçmişti ancak bu süre, {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}gerçekuzay{/g}da on yıllara bedeldi."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
